document_data.name: Dendrand Olaundran
document_data.refs3e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|45-46}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 37: The Satraps of Delzimmer, Part 2}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Dendrand Olaundran''' was a member of the [[Olaundran]] merchant family in [[Delzimmer]] ''circa'' the [[1373 DR|Year of Rogue Dragons, 1373 DR]].
document_data.Description: Dendrand was getting on in years, but unlike his brother [[Gauthklaun Olaundran|Gauthklaun]], he was still sharp and capable.
document_data.Personality: Alert for any sign of disrespect, he was a vindictive man that never let a slight go unanswered, always getting his revenge sooner or later.
document_data.Abilities: Dendrand was an accomplished and dangerous [[wizard]].
document_data.Relationships: Dendrand was a brother of [[Gauthklaun Olaundran]], the patriarch of the clan, and uncle to [[Yolaun Olaundran|Yolaun]] and [[Bezrar Olaundran|Bezrar]].
